title: Observation of ordered vortices with Andreev bound states in Ba0.6K0.4Fe2As2
title_cn: Ba0.6K0.4Fe2As2中具有Andreev束缚态的有序涡旋的观察
abstract: For a type-II superconductor in an applied magnetic field greater than the lower critical field Hc1, the magnetic flux will penetrate into the superconductor and form quantized vortices with Andreev bound states in the vortex cores. The characteristics of the bound states are related to the pairing symmetry and band structure of the superconductor. Recently, a new family of high temperature (high-Tc) superconductors, the iron pnictides, has been discovered. Surprisingly, in electron-doped Ba(Fe1−xCox)2As2, no bound state was found in the vortices. Here, we use a low-temperature scanning tunnelling microscope to study the electronic structure of hole-doped Ba0.6K0.4Fe2As2. Two superconducting gaps (with gap values 2Δ/kBTc≈2.2 and 5.1, where kB is Boltzmann’s constant) were observed in the superconducting state. By applying magnetic fields, we observed ordered vortices with Andreev bound states in the vortex cores. The bound states and their spatial evolution can be qualitatively explained by our numerical calculations for multiband s-wave superconductivity.
abstract_cn: 对于施加磁场大于下临界磁场H c1 的II型超导体，磁通量将渗透到超导体中，并在涡旋核中形成具有Andreev束缚态的量化涡旋。束缚态的特性与超导体的配对对称性和能带结构有关。最近，发现了一个新的高温（高T c ）超导体家族，即铁磷化物。令人惊讶的是，在掺杂电子的Ba（Fe 1＆＃8722; x Co x ） 2 As 2 中，没有在涡旋中发现束缚态。在这里，我们使用低温扫描隧道显微镜研究掺杂空穴的Ba 0.6 K 0.4 Fe 2 As 2 。两个超导间隙（间隙值为2＆＃916; / k B T c ＆＃8776; 2.2和5.1，其中k B 是玻尔兹曼＆ ＃8217; s常数）在超导状态下观察到。通过施加磁场，我们在涡旋核中观察到了具有安德列夫键态的有序涡旋。通过对多频带s波超导的数值计算，可以定性地解释束缚态及其空间演化。

title: Heat capacity through the magnetic-field-induced resistive transition in an underdoped high-temperature superconductor
title_cn: 在欠掺杂的高温超导体中通过磁场感应的电阻跃迁产生的热容
abstract: The underlying physics of the magnetic-field induced resistive state in lightly doped high-temperature cuprate superconductorsremains a mystery. One interpretation is that the application of magnetic field destroys the d-wave superconducting gap, uncovering a Fermi surface that behaves as a Fermi liquid. Another view is that an applied magnetic field destroys long-range superconducting phase coherence, but the superconducting gap amplitude survives. By measuring the specific heat of YBa2Cu3O6.56 we determine the quasiparticle density of states from the superconducting state well into the magnetic-field induced resistive state. At very high magnetic fields the specific heat exhibits both the conventional temperature dependence and quantum oscillations expected for a Fermi liquid. On the other hand, the magnetic-field dependence of the quasiparticle density of states follows behaviour that persists smoothly through the zero-resistance transition, giving evidence of a developed d-wave superconducting gap over the entire magnetic field range measured.
abstract_cn: 轻度掺杂的高温铜酸盐超导体中磁场感应电阻态的基本物理原理仍然是一个谜。一种解释是，磁场的施加破坏了d波超导间隙，露出了表现为费米液体的费米表面。另一种观点是，施加的磁场破坏了远距离超导相干性，但超导间隙幅度仍然存在。通过测量YBa 2 Cu 3 O 6.56 的比热，我们确定了从超导态到磁场的态的准粒子密度诱导的电阻状态。在非常高的磁场下，比热表现出常规的温度依赖性和费米液体所期望的量子振荡。另一方面，准粒子密度的磁场依赖性遵循行为，该行为在零电阻跃迁中平稳地持续存在，这提供了在所测量的整个磁场范围内都产生了d波超导间隙的证据。

title: Random telegraph photosignals in a microwave-exposed two-dimensional electron system
title_cn: 微波暴露的二维电子系统中的随机电报光晕
abstract: The magneto-resistance of high-mobility two-dimensional electron systems exposed to microwaves exhibits radiation-induced oscillations with some minima approaching zero within experimental accuracy. Consensus has been reached that they originate from disorder-assisted indirect optical transitions and a non-equilibrium population of the electronic states. Both mechanisms capture the hall-marks of the observed oscillations except for the appearance of zero resistance. Theory has predicted that in the minima the resistivity can become negative. Then a homogeneous system turns unstable and current domains with large internal Hall electric fields pointing in opposite directions spontaneously form to produce zero resistance. Direct evidence for such domains has remained elusive. Here we introduce time as an unexplored parameter. Probing internal Hall voltages reveals random telegraph signals in the zero-resistance regime. They provide compelling evidence for spontaneous switching between two different distributions of the electric field, which is attributed to two distinct current domain configurations.
abstract_cn: 暴露于微波的高迁移率二维电子系统的磁阻表现出辐射诱发的振荡，在实验精度范围内一些最小值接近零。已经达成共识，它们源自无序辅助的间接光学跃迁和电子态的非平衡族。除了出现零电阻外，这两种机制都捕获了观察到的振荡的霍尔标记。理论预测，在最小值时，电阻率可能变为负值。然后，一个均匀的系统变成不稳定的区域，并自发形成带有指向相反方向的大内部霍尔电场的电流域，以产生零电阻。这些领域的直接证据仍然难以捉摸。在这里，我们将时间作为未探索的参数进行介绍。探测内部霍尔电压可发现零电阻状态下的随机电报信号。它们为电场的两种不同分布之间的自发切换提供了令人信服的证据，这归因于两种不同的电流域配置。

title: Nearly non-magnetic valence band of the ferromagnetic semiconductor GaMnAs
title_cn: 铁磁半导体GaMnAs的近非价带
abstract: The origin of ferromagnetism in the prototype ferromagnetic semiconductor GaMnAs is controversial because of an insufficient understanding of its band structure and Fermi level position. This is a major issue for further development of this material for future semiconductor spintronics. Here, using a unique method combining a precise etching technique and resonant tunnelling spectroscopy, applied to a variety of surface GaMnAs layers, we can elucidate the universal valence-band (VB) picture of GaMnAs. We find that the VB structure of GaAs is almost perfectly maintained and does not merge with the impurity band for any of the GaMnAs samples, with Mn concentrations ranging from 6 to 15%, that we examined. Furthermore, the exchange splitting of the VB is found to be very small (only several millielectronvolts), even in GaMnAs with a high Curie temperature (154 K). Our findings shed light on the precise mechanism behind ferromagnetism in GaMnAs; a subject that has been debated for more than a decade.
abstract_cn: 原型铁磁半导体GaMnAs中铁磁的起源是有争议的，因为对它的能带结构和费米能级位置了解不足。这是用于未来半导体自旋电子学的这种材料的进一步开发的主要问题。在这里，通过将精确刻蚀技术和共振隧道光谱相结合的独特方法，将其应用于各种表面GaMnAs层，我们可以阐明GaMnAs的通用价带（VB）图。我们发现，GaAs的VB结构几乎可以完美保持，并且不会与我们检测的任何Mn浓度为6％至15％的GaMnAs样品的杂质带合并。此外，发现即使在居里温度高（154＆＃8201; K）的GaMnAs中，VB的交换分裂也很小（仅几毫伏）。我们的发现揭示了GaMnAs中铁磁性背后的精确机制。这个话题已经辩论了十多年了。

title: Gate-dependent spin–orbit coupling in multielectron carbon nanotubes
title_cn: 多电子碳纳米管中与门相关的自旋-轨道耦合
abstract: Understanding how the orbital motion of electrons is coupled to the spin degree of freedom in nanoscale systems is central for applications in spin-based electronics and quantum computation. Here we demonstrate such spin–orbit coupling in a carbon-nanotube quantum dot in the general multielectron regime and in the presence of finite disorder. Also, we find a systematic dependence of the spin–orbit coupling on the electron occupation of the quantum dot. Such a dependence has not been seen in any other system and follows from the curvature-induced spin–orbit-split Dirac spectrum of the underlying graphene lattice. Our findings suggest that the spin–orbit coupling is a general property of carbon-nanotube quantum dots, which should provide a unique platform for the study of spin–orbit effects and their applications.
abstract_cn: 了解电子的轨道运动如何与纳米级系统中的自旋自由度耦合对于在基于自旋的电子学和量子计算中的应用至关重要。 在这里，我们证明了在碳纳米管量子点中，在一般的多电子状态下以及存在有限无序情况下的这种自旋轨道耦合。 另外，我们发现自旋轨道耦合对量子点电子占据的系统依赖性。 这种依赖性在任何其他系统中都没有看到，并且遵循下面的石墨烯晶格的曲率诱导的自旋轨道分裂狄拉克光谱。 我们的发现表明，自旋轨道耦合是碳纳米管量子点的一般属性，应该为自旋轨道效应及其应用研究提供一个独特的平台。

title: Piezoresistive heat engine and refrigerator
title_cn: 压阻热机和冰箱
abstract: Heat engines provide most of our mechanical power and are essential for transportation on the macroscopic scale. However, although significant progress has been made in the miniaturization of electrostatic engines, it has proved difficult to reduce the size of liquid- or gas-driven heat engines below 107 μm3. Here we demonstrate that a crystalline silicon structure operates as a cyclic piezoresistive heat engine when it is driven by a sufficiently high d.c. current. A 0.34 μm3 engine beam draws heat from the d.c. current using the piezoresistive effect and converts it into mechanical work by expansion and contraction at different temperatures. This mechanical power drives a silicon resonator of 1.1×103 μm3 into sustained oscillation. Even below the oscillation threshold the engine beam continues to amplify the resonator’s Brownian motion. When its thermodynamic cycle is inverted, the structure is shown to reduce these thermal fluctuations, therefore operating as a refrigerator.
abstract_cn: 热力发动机提供了我们的大部分机械动力，对于宏观运输至关重要。但是，尽管在静电发动机的小型化方面已经取得了显着进展，但是事实证明难以将液体或气体驱动的热力发动机的尺寸减小到10 7以下。 m 3 。在这里，我们证明了当由足够高的d.c驱动时，晶体硅结构可作为循环压阻热机运行。当前。 0.34＆＃8201;＆＃956; m 3 引擎光束从直流吸热。电流使用压阻效应，并通过在不同温度下的膨胀和收缩将其转换为机械功。该机械动力将1.1＆＃215; 10 3 ＆＃8201;＆＃956; m 3 的硅谐振器驱动为持续振荡。甚至低于振荡阈值，发动机光束仍继续放大谐振器的布朗运动。当其热力学周期反转时，该结构可减少这些热波动，因此可作为冰箱使用。

title: Observations and simulations of non-local acceleration of electrons in magnetotail magnetic reconnection events
title_cn: 磁尾磁重联事件中电子非局部加速度的观察与模拟
abstract: Magnetic reconnection in magnetized plasmas represents a change in magnetic field topology and is associated with a concomitant energization of charged particles that results from a conversion of magnetic energy into particle energy. In Earth’s magnetosphere this process is associated with the entry of the solar wind into the magnetosphere and with the initiation of auroral substorms. Using data from the THEMIS mission, together with global and test particle simulations, we demonstrate that electrons are energized in two distinct regions: a low-energy population (less than or equal to a few kiloelectronvolts) that arises in a diffusion region where particles are demagnetized and the magnetic topology changes, and a high-energy component (approaching 100 keV) that results from betatron acceleration within dipolarization fronts that sweep towards the inner magnetosphere far from the diffusion region. Thus, the observed particle energization is associated with both magnetic reconnection and with betatron acceleration associated with macroscopic flows.
abstract_cn: 磁化等离子体中的磁重连接表示磁场拓扑结构的变化，并且与带电粒子的伴随通电相关，该带电激励是将磁能转换为粒子能而产生的。在地球磁层中，这一过程与太阳风进入磁层以及极光亚暴的发生有关。利用来自THEMIS任务的数据，以及整体和测试粒子模拟，我们证明了电子在两个不同的区域被激发：低能量总体（小于或等于几千电子伏特）出现在粒子所在的扩散区域消磁，磁拓扑发生变化，高能分量（接近100＆＃8201; keV）是由双极化锋面内的电子感应加速器加速而产生的，它朝着远离扩散区域的内部磁层扫荡。因此，观测到的粒子通电与磁重联以及与宏观流有关的电子加速器加速有关。</ p>
